contribs-title: Title for screen showing the user's uploaded media files
contribs-settings-button: Button text for opening settings screen. Should be short, sits on a toolbar.
contribs-upload-button: Button text for starting a batch upload. Should be short, sits on a toolbar.
contribs-photo-library-button: Button text for opening the device's photo library to import an image. Should be short, sits on a toolbar.
contribs-state-queued: Label on not-yet-uploaded photo items in contributions list view
contribs-state-uploading: Label on currently-uploading photo items in contributions list view
contribs-refresh: Label appearing on 'pull-to-refresh' area above upload scroller view
error-upload-failed: Error message indicating that upload failed.
error-dismiss: Button text for dismissing error alert.
error-nologin-title: Title for error dialog, informal is ok.
error-nologin-text: Detail text for error alert indicating you must log in before uploading.
reltime-minutes: Relative time to display on photos. $1 is time in minutes. Note that PLURAL will be supported, but is not yet.
reltime-hours: Relative time to display on photos. $1 is time in hours. Note that PLURAL will be supported, but is not yet.
reltime-days: Relative time to display on photos. $1 is time in days. Note that PLURAL will be supported, but is not yet.
settings-title: Title for screen where the user can input their account info and settings
settings-username-label: Label for username field in settings
settings-username-placeholder: Placeholder text for username field in settings
settings-password-label: Label for password field in settings
settings-password-placeholder: Placeholder text for password field in settings
settings-debug-label: Label for debug mode switch in settings (switches between uploading to Commons and to a test site)
settings-debug-detail: Label indicating which site photos will be uploaded to. $1 is a domain name such as commons.wikimedia.org
details-upload-button: Button text for button to begin uploading the selected photo
details-title-label: Label for title input/display field on photo details
details-title-placeholder: Placeholder text for title input field on photo details
details-description-label: Label for description input/display field on photo details
details-license-label: Label for license selector/display field on photo details
web-open-in: Button text for opening web page in a given browser. $1 is the application name such as 'Safari' or 'Opera'
